name: Debabrata Pati
bio_html: Senior AI/ML professional with patented innovations commercialized into enterprise platforms. Guides teams from researchto operational AI/ML products, driving outcomes including a 14% sales uplift within 6 months via AI personalization, ~30%AML false positive reduction within two quarters, and 75% SAR generation time optimization.
contact_note: References & contacts will be furnished up on request.
profile_summary: Innovator & Data Analytics Proffesional| Lead Data Scientist at Aktana | Indian School of Business Alum | Multiple Patent Holder | Forever Student
experience_summary: Senior Data Scientist with extensive AI/ML R&D and deployment experience at Aktana, NICE Actimize, and Cognizant. Leading pharma omnichannel analytics, delivering double-digit sales uplift via propensity modeling, counterfactual analysis, journey optimization, and reinforcement learning. Built scalable MLOps/model factory frameworks, halving deployment time. Previously drove AI-based AML and financial crime detection, reducing false positives ~30% and cutting investigation time 75%. Skilled in graph analytics, NLP, experimentation, and regulatory-grade AI, with multiple international patents and award-winning contributions.
experience_highlights: Senior AI/ML Proffesional Driving Enterprise-Scale Intelligence
From Patents to Production: AI That Delivers Measurable Business Impact
